## Amaya's Lab Progress 
```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(rvest)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
# Define the URL
url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/hof_2024.shtml"

# Read the webpage
webpage <- read_html(url)

# Extract the table
hof_table <- webpage %>% html_node("table") %>% html_table()

# Preview the scraped table
head(hof_table)
```
